title: Maldives Private Island Villas with Underwater Restaurant & Floating Overwater Restaurant
description: Discover secluded luxury and sensational hospitality on intimate tropical isles at Niyama Private Islands Maldives. Spread across twin islands 'Play' and 'Chill', the idyllic resort offers the luxury of choice, spend your days frolicking in the treetops, finding your Zen with sunrise yoga, sailing with dolphins at sunset or surfing Vodi - a world class perfect "left hander" wave that breaks right on the resort and that has attracted top surfers from across the globe. When it comes time to eat, you'll be spoilt with an incredible lineup of unique restaurants: indulge in champagne breakfasts underwater at Subsix, feast on sumptuous dishes at the overwater Edge - accessible only by boat - and enjoy Asian-style cuisine at lofty heights in the treetops in Nest. When you're not sampling the resort's nine restaurants, allow yourself to be pampered at Drift Spa, a heavenly space with soothing lagoon views.
